billable.description: Indicates if the time spent is billable or not.

note.description: Additional notes or comments related to this time entry.

id.description: The unique identifier of this time entry.

timer_running.description: Indicates if a timer is currently running for this time entry.

agent_id.description: The unique identifier of the agent assigned to this time entry.

ticket_id.description: The unique identifier of the ticket associated with this time entry.

company_id.description: The unique identifier of the company associated with this time entry.

time_spent.description: The amount of time spent on the ticket in hours and minutes.

executed_at.description: The date and time when this time entry was executed or completed.

start_time.description: The start date and time of this time entry.

created_at.description: The date and time when this time entry was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when this time entry was last updated.
